content: {"name": "Philadelphia County Assistance Office - Chelten District-SNAP Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.pa.gov/content/dam/copapwp-pagov/en/dhs/documents/services/assistance/documents/snap/PA-1990-SunBucks-Application.pdf\nIf you need help completing the application form or need more information about benefits, trained county assistance office staff can help you in person. To get SNAP benefits, your income has to be under certain limits. SNAP households may receive deductions from their gross income for things like housing costs, child or dependent care payments, and medical expenses more than $35 for older adults or people with disabilities. Learn more about eligibility requirements for SNAP: https://www.fns.usda.gov/snap/recipient/eligibility", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dhs.pa.gov/Services/Assistance/Pages/SNAP.aspx", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "301 East Chelten Avenue", "address_2": "1st Flr. ", "city": "East Germantown", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19144", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0394063, "longitude": -75.1714476}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 560-5200", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
